backend/main.mo: Defines weather-related types and provides query endpoints returning mock daily, weekly, and current weather data with simple caching structure.
backend/migration.mo: Contains a migration module that initializes a new actor state with an optional rainViewerCache set to null.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature requirements to frontend files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides human-written summaries describing functionality of major frontend files in the project.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base, components, and utilities, plus extensive CSS variable themes for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component managing location, weather fetching, alerts, widget publishing, theming, and tab navigation.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundIllust: Renders themed background images with smooth transitions and light/dark gradient overlays based on weather theme.
frontend/src/components/BeachMarineScree: Displays marine conditions for a selected beach with loading, empty, and error states, showing temperature, waves, and related data.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Renders a bottom navigation bar with tab buttons for weather, farmer, driver, radar, and beach views.
frontend/src/components/DriverWeatherPan: Shows driver-focused weather advisories, route analysis, and risk assessments with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/FarmerGardenWeat: Provides farming-related weather advisories such as frost, soil moisture, precipitation, planting, and spraying conditions.
frontend/src/components/FloatingAutocomp: Implements a floating dropdown positioned relative to an anchor, with dynamic placement, sizing, and outside-click handling.
frontend/src/components/ImminentWeatherA: Displays a styled banner for imminent weather alerts with icons, severity styling, and a dismiss button.
frontend/src/components/InitialRenderErr: Error boundary that catches initial render errors and displays a fallback UI with refresh and technical details.
frontend/src/components/LanguageDropdown: Interactive language selector overlay that positions itself relative to a trigger button and closes on outside click or Escape. Allows switching between Turkish and English via portal-rendered dropdown.
frontend/src/components/LaundryDryingRec: Displays optimal laundry drying times based on weather data, showing best and alternative ranges or a warning when none are suitable.
frontend/src/components/LocationSearch.t: Location search input with autocomplete using geocoding results, allowing selection or clearing of the current location. Shows a floating dropdown for search results.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarAlert: Displays a dismissible alert banner for radar warnings with severity-based styling and translated text.
Provides a side sheet UI to configure alert settings like enable toggle and radius slider.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarEmpty: Shows an empty state when no radar data is available, using translated title and description.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarForec: Renders a floating label indicating that the displayed radar data is a short-term forecast.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarFrame: Toggle control for switching between forecast and past radar frame modes with translations.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarInfoP: Displays computed radar summary info such as start time, duration, intensity, and direction for the current frame.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarLayer: Side sheet UI for enabling or disabling additional radar layers via switches.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarMap.t: Initializes and manages a Leaflet map with location marker and dynamic radar/overlay layers, updating on location or layer changes.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarOverl: Shows loading, error, or no-data overlay messages for non-precipitation radar layers based on state and returned overlay data.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarPlayb: Provides playback buttons and a timeline slider for navigating radar frames, with handling for user interaction and disabled states.
frontend/src/components/RadarScreen.tsx: Main radar UI combining map, playback, overlays, alerts, and location search. Manages radar data fetching, frame playback, and forecast/past mode switching.
frontend/src/components/RouteLocationSea: Autocomplete search component for selecting a route location, supporting clearing, loading states, and error display. Uses floating dropdown results from geocoding search.
frontend/src/components/ThemeProvider.ts: Provides a weather‑based theme context and toggles dark mode based on weather conditions. Wraps children with a theme‑annotated container.
frontend/src/components/WeatherPanel.tsx: Weather overview panel showing current conditions, advisories, AQI/UV categories, and laundry recommendations with loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGeocodingSearch.ts: Performs debounced geocoding searches using React Query, returning results, loading state, and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useImminentWeatherAle: Manages imminent weather alerts with dismissal cooldowns and optional Android WebView notifications, tracking alert changes and persistence with sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login flow using Dfinity AuthClient, including identity loading, login state, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarineConditions.t: Fetches marine weather data via React Query using Open-Meteo's marine API, with timed refetching and validation of coordinates.
Stores and retrieves a saved location from localStorage, exposing methods to set and clear the persisted value.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublishWidgetWeath: Publishes weather data to the backend via a mutation using an actor, exposing publish state and handling errors without UI disruption.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting that backend queries are implemented within feature-specific hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useRadarAlerts.ts: Generates simple radar-based severe weather alerts using session-stored settings, detecting heavy precipitation and managing alert dismissal.
frontend/src/hooks/useRadarOverlayData.t: Fetches radar overlay weather data, air quality, and temperature grids from Open-Meteo APIs and computes derived storm intensity.
frontend/src/hooks/useRadarPlayback.ts: Controls radar playback animation with play, pause, seek, and frame label utilities, handling looping and frame resets.
frontend/src/hooks/useRainViewer.ts: Loads RainViewer radar data via backend actor with caching and validation, falling back to cached data when valid.
frontend/src/hooks/useRouteWeatherAnalys: Interpolates route points, fetches weather for each, transforms the data, and returns a route weather analysis via React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionState.ts: Custom hook that syncs React state with sessionStorage using a key and default value.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeather.ts: Fetches weather and air quality data, transforms it into a unified WeatherData object, and exposes it through React Query.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides locale state, persistence, and translation lookup through a React context.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Contains Turkish and English translation strings for UI text keys.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: Convenience hook to access the i18n context and translation function.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind setup, theme variables, dark mode, and weather‑themed CSS variants with glass-surface utilities.
frontend/src/lib/clothingAdvisories.ts: Generates clothing recommendations based on temperature, precipitation, wind, and near‑term weather.
frontend/src/lib/driverAdvisories.ts: Computes road ice risk and fog warnings from current and hourly weather data.
frontend/src/lib/farmerAdvisories.ts: Defines advisory interfaces and computes frost, soil moisture, precipitation, planting, and spraying recommendations based on hourly weather data.
frontend/src/lib/fetchWithTimeout.ts: Provides a fetch wrapper with AbortController that enforces a configurable timeout and throws on request cancellation.
frontend/src/lib/formatDailyForecastDate: Formats an ISO date into a short, locale‑specific weekday and month string using Intl.DateTimeFormat.
frontend/src/lib/imminentWeatherAlerts.t: Analyzes the next hour of weather data to detect imminent rain, snow, storms, or fog and returns a structured alert.
frontend/src/lib/laundryDrying.ts: Calculates hourly drying scores based on humidity, wind, temperature, and precipitation, and derives recommended drying time ranges.
frontend/src/lib/openMeteo.ts: Fetches and normalizes weather data from the Open‑Meteo API, providing current, hourly, and daily fields along with soil moisture.
frontend/src/lib/openMeteoMarine.ts: Fetches marine conditions and supplemental weather data, deriving wave, wind, temperature, and visibility metrics.
frontend/src/lib/radarNowcastSummary.ts: Generates a radar summary estimating start time, duration, intensity, and direction of precipitation from RainViewer frames.
frontend/src/lib/radarOverlays.ts: Computes visual parameters for various radar overlay types based on weather data, including storm, snow, wind, temperature, and air quality. Includes helper functions for temperature coloring and intensity.
frontend/src/lib/rainviewer.ts: Parses and normalizes RainViewer radar data, filters nowcast frames, and determines the initial playback frame. Provides utilities for validating and combining radar frames.
frontend/src/lib/rainviewerCache.ts: Manages sessionStorage caching for RainViewer data with validation, backward compatibility handling, and expiration logic. Allows reading and writing normalized radar cache entries.
frontend/src/lib/routeAnalysis.ts: Analyzes a route's weather conditions to compute risk levels based on freezing temps, fog, precipitation, and wind. Returns an overall risk rating with detailed contributing factors.
frontend/src/lib/tirePressure.ts: Calculates tire pressure adjustments based on temperature and vehicle type using a simple PSI-per-10°C model. Returns an adjustment string and a translation key explaining the recommendation.
frontend/src/lib/weatherContrast.ts: Determines whether a weather theme should use a dark background, treating rain and snow as dark themes. Simple utility for UI theming.
frontend/src/lib/weatherTheme.ts: Maps WMO weather codes to themes, icons, and translation keys for descriptions. Provides utilities for determining weather visuals and labels.
frontend/src/lib/widgetWeatherPayload.ts: Builds backend-compatible widget weather payloads from frontend weather data and generates stable location keys. Converts daily and weekly weather info into a backend-defined response format.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React application with query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the App component. Imports global styles and mounts the root element.
frontend/src/types/androidBridge.d.ts: Declares the Android bridge interface on the Window object for invoking native notifications. Provides TypeScript typings for optional Android integration.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Includes Vite client type definitions for the project environment.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom fonts, colors, radii, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: Sets Node-specific TypeScript options for Vite, enabling composite builds and ESNext module resolution.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Defines Vite build setup with React plugin, path aliasing, dev server proxy, and build output settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requirements, architectural notes, and pending radar-related feature requests.
